errors.error: TypeError: Cannot read property 'length' of undefined
errors.description: Occurs when attempting to access the length property of a value that is undefined.
errors.solution: Ensure the variable is defined before accessing its properties.
errors.cause: The variable was not initialized or incorrectly assigned.
suggestions: Check if the variable is properly initialized.
Use a null or undefined check before accessing its properties.
Add default values to ensure the variable is always defined.
